沷字的基本解释

沷
fā
寒冷。
疏浚。

沷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fā］
［《玉篇》府伐切］
(1)寒。
(2)疏浚，疏通水流。

沷字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　沷； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页614第01
【玉篇】府伐切，音發。寒也。一曰渫也，通流也。【木華·海賦】鏟臨崖之阜陸，決陂潢而相沷。【註】沷，灌也。一曰凡壅水處決之，使相沷蕩也。　又敷勿切，音弗。義同。

沷字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
沷字的起名意思

暂无。

fā
cold.
Dredging.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fā］
[Fu Cutting in "Jade Pian"]
(1) Cold.
(2) Dredging and dredging the water flow.
Pi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Character Department] 　沷; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 614 No. 01
【Jade articles】Fu cut and cut, sound made. Han Ye. One said 渫 Ye, Tong Liu Ye. [Muhua·Haifu] shovel the Fulu near the cliff, determine the lake and feast. [Note] Pi, Guan Ye. One said that the execution of him by the backwater caused the phases to sway.　Don't cut it again, Yin Fu. The same meaning.
